1178960.name: Visual Novel Maker - Symphonic Adventure Music Vol.2 - Additional Tracks -
1178960.description:
Rolling, adventurous, epic and nostalgic, Vol. 2 of the Symphonic Adventure Music Series is a fantastic expansion leaving off where Vol 1 ended. Featuring lush orchestration, this 27-song fantasy music pack contains more sweeping prologues, epic battle themes, triumphant openings, music for dark and ominous dungeons, field scenes, more of everything you need to bring your games and stories to life!

Features:

* 27 BGM, 20 ME, 10 BGS for royalty-free use
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Beautiful and powerful music with orchestration for Fantasy RPG, Adventure RPG and much more!
* Music for opening and prologue, battle, field and a variety of scenes!
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!
